product_overview: FarmSense is a smart farm homepage and technology blog platform that provides advanced educational guides and technical insights on sensor integration, water management, and yield prediction, built with modern web technologies for responsive and intuitive user experience.
core_goals: Provide global navigation with dropdown menus and mobile responsiveness for seamless user access.
Deliver educational content on sensor building and integration for beginners and advanced users.
Offer technical blog articles on soil water potential, irrigation logic, and AI-powered yield prediction.
Implement a consistent root layout with providers and global styles for UI consistency.
Enable global modal management to support user interactions like contact forms.
Ensure deployment and continuous delivery via Vercel integrating with GitHub repository.
key_features: Global Navigation Bar with dropdowns and responsive design.
Root layout wrapping application pages with global styles and providers.
Technical blog pages on Water Logic and Yield Prediction with detailed content.
Sensor Education Guides split into Beginner (ESP32 sensors) and Advanced (LoRa and RS-485 sensors).
Technology Blog Footer linking to support and additional info.
Modal System for global dialog management including Contact Modal.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage with hero and information sections.
User accesses navigation bar to explore Technology Blog or Sensor Education pages.
User reads technical articles such as Water Logic or Yield Prediction under Technology section.
User navigates to Education section choosing Beginner or Advanced sensor building guides.
User triggers contact modal via UI element and submits inquiries.
User experiences responsive UI across desktop and mobile devices.
User returns to homepage or other sections using global navigation bar.
validation_criteria: Navigation bar works correctly with dropdowns on desktop and is fully responsive on mobile.
All blog and education pages render with proper content and layout consistency.
Modal system opens and closes correctly and handles user input properly.
Global styles and providers apply uniformly across all pages.
Deployment to Vercel completes successfully with correct domain and environment configurations.
GitHub repository is properly synced with deployment pipeline.
Images and assets load within size restrictions and perform well on devices.
